about_the_game:
About Game

This game combines deck building, semi-real-time combat, and Roguelike gameplay. In a 3D space,draft craft a unique deck, challenge monstrous bosses with various skills, discover more cards, and customize card stats. Set foot on the path of trials and slay the rampaging monsters!

Game Features

  • Dynamic Deck Building: On the path of trials, various cards will be discovered. Choose cards freely and draft their stats to create powerful combinations, dealing massive damage.

  • Randomly Generated Level Data: The stats of enemies change dynamically in each trial , making each exploration uniquely fun and unpredictable.

  • Card Refining and Forging: Each card can be highly customized, and with the bead system, you can create magical effects by combining them in different ways.

  • Semi-Real-Time Combat in 3D: Experience unprecedented excitement and strategy in semi-real-time combat, where you need to think carefully about the best way to attack and slay various monsters.

  • 100+ Cards: Freely combine and match cards to form amazing combos, unlocking unique synergies.
